title: Child model, 6, dubbed 'most beautiful girl in the world' for her 'unearthly beauty'
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Click to play Tap to play

Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

A six-year-old child model has been dubbed 'the cutest girl in the world' by adoring fans who are wowed by her beauty.

Alina Yakupova from Moscow, Russia, has appeared in fashion campaigns for Italian brand Monnalisa Kids, Russia's Yudashkin kids and Gloria Jeans.

She has also made appearances in Instyle and Grazia magazines.

Alina is represented by the children's modelling and acting agency President Kids (PK) Management.

The model's manager Roman Kukhar told the Daily Mail: "I'm sure that the secret of Alina's success lies not only in her unearthly beauty, but also in hard work and constant self-development, despite her young age."

(Image: Alina Yakupova/Instagram)

(Image: Alina Yakupova/Instagram)

Modelling since the age of four, she continues to wow people all around the world.

She has more than 22,000 Instagram followers, constantly commenting on photos posted of her shoots.

Writing on Instagram, one follower said: "You're the cutest girl in the world."

(Image: Alina Yakupova/Instagram)

(Image: Alina Yakupova/Instagram)

One fan said: "Always beautiful. Leaves us sighing."

Another said: "Oh my god, the most adorable thing ever."

"This little girl is more beautiful than I’ll ever be omg," one Instagram user wrote.

She was also described as "doll beautiful," a "princess" and an "angel" by others.
description: Alina Yakupova, from Moscow, Russia, has more than 22,000 Instagram followers and is described by her fans as a "princess"and an "angel"
